57di me kathawa singni lume athin chitha්rapatiyakata enawa' ee chitha්rapatiya man baluwa' natyayedi adhirangayak widihata ena ha`gimak film eke klos ap ekedi siyum thathwikathwayen nirmanaya wena widiha windinna maru athdakimak' 57 wage kaleka ekama set ekak athule" ekama namak wath pawichchi nowi ^nam dekaka sulu huwamaru wimak aranama& lume karana me film eka sira wadak' athulage nishpadanaya mata danune film ekata godak la`gayi wage' dolahak wedika natyaya balapu hamotama man kiyanne torant eka dawun long karala singni lume ge film ekath balanna' eeta passe 97di meka aayimath film ekakata enawa' wiliyam frengkin karana ee wandeta 57 di karapu eke la`gatawath enna bari wenawa'

kriyakarithwaya saha yedum gabada, bima saha ilektronik karmantha sandaha nirmanaya kara athi petti kalampa mangin palet rahithawa hasirawimata ida salasayi, saha palat miladi ganima, nadaththu kirima sandaha mudal ithiri karayi.
